name: Dallas
summary_text: The next generation of the Ewing family, cousins John Ross Ewing and Christopher Ewing, clash over the family's oil business and vast fortune.

name: The Next Karate Kid
summary_text: Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing: a troubled adolescent girl.

name: Monarch of the Glen
summary_text: Archie MacDonald, a young restaurateur is called back to his childhood home of Glenbogle where he is told he is the new Laird of Glenbogle.

name: Devil's Knot
summary_text: The savage murders of three young children sparks a controversial trial of three teenagers accused of killing the kids as part of a Satanic ritual.

name: Wrong Turn 4: Bloody Beginnings
summary_text: A group of college students gets lost in a storm during their snowmobiling trip and takes shelter in an abandoned sanitarium which, unbeknown to them, is home to three deformed cannibals.

name: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
summary_text: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

name: Soy Luna
summary_text: Luna Valente lives with her family in Cancún, Mexico. She goes to school, has her own group of friends, has a job, and loves to skate. However, her life changes when her parents are given a...                See full summary »

name: Children of Dune
summary_text: The twins of Paul "Muad'dib" Atreides become embroiled in the political landscape of Arrakis ("Dune") and the rest of the universe.

name: Tau
summary_text: A woman is held captive by a scientist in a futuristic smart house, and hopes to escape by reasoning with the Artificial Intelligence that controls the house.

name: The Yards
summary_text: Leo is released from prison after serving time for car theft. His plan to go straight falls apart when he meets his corrupt uncle for a job and later an old friend working there. It culminates at the (railroad) yards.

name: Braven
summary_text: A logger defends his family from a group of dangerous drug runners.

name: Hamlet
summary_text: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

name: Timecrafters: The Treasure of Pirate's Cove
summary_text: While searching for lost treasure, time traveling pirates end up in the modern day and do battle with unlikely foes: a group of kids with the latest in techy gadgetry.

name: The House
summary_text: After the town takes away their daughter's college scholarship, a couple start an illegal casino in their friend's house to make back the money.

name: Nightbreed
summary_text: A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy.

name: Miracle in Cell No. 7
summary_text: A story about the love between a mentally-ill father and his lovingly adorable daughter.

name: The Killing
summary_text: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

name: Indian Summers
summary_text: Drama set in 1932 during the final years of British colonial rule in India.

name: The Human Stain
summary_text: When a disgraced former college dean has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark, twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking fact about his own life that he has kept secret for fifty years.

name: The Catcher Was a Spy
summary_text: A former major league baseball player, Moe Berg, goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services.
Multinational immigrants traveling from the old continent to the new encounter a nightmarish riddle aboard a second ship adrift on the open sea.

name: Set It Off
summary_text: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting each other.

name: Bad Lieutenant
summary_text: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness and redemption.

name: The Kingdom
summary_text: Doctors at an ultramodern hospital in Denmark become convinced, by way of weird, inexplicable happenings, that the place is haunted.

name: Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look at a fictional sketch-comedy television show.

name: The Occupant
summary_text: Javier Muñoz, once a successful executive, makes the fateful decision to leave his home, which he and his family can no longer afford.

name: They Drive by Night
summary_text: When one of two truck-driving brothers loses an arm, they both join a transport company where the other is falsely charged as an accessory in the murder of the owner.

name: Paris Is Burning
summary_text: A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.

name: Private Life
summary_text: An author is undergoing multiple fertility therapies to get pregnant, putting her relationship with her husband on edge.

name: Captain Blood
summary_text: A young Irish doctor is exiled as a slave to Jamaica where he captures a Spanish galleon and becomes the most feared pirate of the Caribbean.

name: Same Kind of Different as Me
summary_text: International art dealer Ron Hall must befriend a dangerous homeless man in order to save his struggling marriage to his wife, a woman whose dreams will lead all three of them on the journey of their lives.

name: Psych: The Movie
summary_text: The old gang comes together during the holidays after a mystery assailant targets one of their own.

name: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
summary_text: A group of youths aspiring to become professional superheroes, fight in a world full of people with abilities, also known as quirks. Deku and his fellow classmates from Hero Academy face Nine, the strongest villain yet.

name: Black Lagoon
summary_text: A Japanese businessman, captured by modern-day pirates, is written off and left for dead by his company. Tired of the corporate life, he opts to stick with the mercenaries that kidnapped him, becoming part of their gang.

name: The 400 Blows
summary_text: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

name: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
summary_text: When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

name: Temptation Island
summary_text: Couples travel to a tropical paradise where they are forced to decide if they're ready to commit to one another for the rest of their lives. A reboot of the 2001 reality series.

name: The Sure Thing
summary_text: Walter Gibson is a university freshman going through a dry spell. His old buddy arranges a "sure thing" for him in California. Gibson and his classmate Allison then take a long road trip out to Cali, and both foil each other's plans.

name: The Painted Bird
summary_text: A young Jewish boy somewhere in Eastern Europe seeks refuge during World War II where he encounters many different characters.

name: Halloweentown
summary_text: When a young girl living with her good-witch grandmother learns she too is a witch, she must help her grandmother save Halloweentown from evil forces.

name: Taken
summary_text: Three families experience alien abductions over a period of five decades.

name: SpaceCamp
summary_text: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

name: Nowhere Boy
summary_text: A chronicle of John Lennon's first years, focused mainly in his adolescence and his relationship with his stern aunt Mimi, who raised him, and his absentee mother Julia, who re-entered his life at a crucial moment in his young life.

name: Elena of Avalor
summary_text: Princess Elena has saved her magical kingdom, Avalor, from an evil sorceress and must learn to rule as its crown princess. Elena's adventures will lead her to understand that her new role requires thoughtfulness, resilience and compassion.

name: Deadly Sugar Daddy
summary_text: After graduating from college, Bridget moves to a new town with her best friend Lindsay. She takes a job as an Executive Assistant to Anthony Gloss but she will soon learn that a life of luxury can come at a deadly price.

name: Hee Haw
summary_text: Televised comedy/variety show with a country bent.

name: Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call New Orleans
summary_text: Terence McDonagh is a drug- and gambling-addled detective in post-Katrina New Orleans investigating the killing of five Senegalese immigrants.

name: A Star Is Born
summary_text: A film star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career on a downward spiral.

name: Woman in Gold
summary_text: Maria Altmann, an octogenarian Jewish refugee, takes on the Austrian government to recover artwork she believes rightfully belongs to her family.

name: Married Life
summary_text: A 1940s-set drama where an adulterous man plots his wife's death instead of putting her through the humiliation of a divorce.

name: Elena Undone
summary_text: Fate brings two diversely different women together, and sets them on a collision course that will shatter their preconceived notions about love, life and the power of one's soul.

name: Guest House
summary_text: An newly engaged couple's buys their dream house but it comes with one small catch, a perennial party animal who lives in the guesthouse.

name: Divorce
summary_text: A couple goes through a long, drawn-out divorce.

name: Clementine
summary_text: Reeling from a one-sided breakup, heartbroken Karen breaks into her ex's lake house. There, she strikes up a complicated relationship with provocative younger woman Lana.

name: Nothing in Common
summary_text: A highly successful advertising executive decides to put his job on hold after getting an update from his father that he and his wife are divorcing and decides to extend his break after revealing that his father is a diabetic.

name: Ben-Hur
summary_text: Judah Ben-Hur, a prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

name: Sleepwalkers
summary_text: A mother-and-son team of strange supernatural creatures move to a small town to seek out a young virgin to feed on.

name: Midnight Mass
summary_text: An isolated island community experiences miraculous events - and frightening omens - after the arrival of a charismatic, mysterious young priest.

name: Separation
summary_text: A young girl finds solace in her artist father and the ghost of her dead mother.

name: Voltron: Legendary Defender
summary_text: Five teenagers become the last line of defense for the galaxy in an intergalactic battle against the evil alien force led by King Zarkon.

name: Ray
summary_text: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

name: The People Under the Stairs
summary_text: Two adults and a juvenile break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children. There, they must fight for their lives.

name: Naked
summary_text: Nervous about finally getting married, a guy is forced to relive the same nerve-wracking hours over and over again until he gets things right on his wedding day.

name: The Man Who Knew Infinity
summary_text: The story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, and his friendship with his mentor, Professor G.H. Hardy.

name: The Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc
summary_text: A young girl receives a vision that drives her to rid France of its oppressors.

name: *batteries not included
summary_text: Aliens help a feisty old New York couple in their battle against the ruthless land developer who's out to evict them.

name: Uptown Girls
summary_text: A grown-up woman who kept her childish instincts and behavior starts working as the nanny of an 8-year-old girl who actually acts like an adult. But everything ends right-side up.

name: The Lawnmower Man
summary_text: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

name: Bless the Harts
summary_text: A group of Southerners strive to live the American dream.

name: Blow the Man Down
summary_text: Mary Beth and Priscilla Connolly attempt to cover up a gruesome run-in with a dangerous man. To conceal their crime, the sisters must go deep into the criminal underbelly of their hometown, uncovering the town's darkest secrets.

name: Big Bad Wolves
summary_text: After a little girl is brutally murdered, a suspect avoids arrest due to lack of evidence. Working separately, her father and a cop decide to do something about it.

name: Guess Who
summary_text: A young woman, Theresa, brings her boyfriend, Simon, home to meet her parents and surprise them with the news of their engagement. Another surprise: Simon is white.

name: Hangman
summary_text: A homicide detective brings his partner out of retirement to help catch a serial killer whose crimes are based on the children's game Hangman.

name: The Lookout
summary_text: Chris is a once promising high school athlete whose life is turned upside down following a tragic accident. As he tries to maintain a normal life, he takes a job as a janitor at a bank, where he ultimately finds himself caught up in a planned heist.

name: Chasing Liberty
summary_text: Anna wants to be like other girls her age (18): date a guy etc. but she's the US president's daughter and always guarded. In Prague he breaks his promise of only 2 agents following her to a concert and she runs away with Ben to see Europe.

name: Beverly Hills Cop III
summary_text: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

name: Quicksand
summary_text: Maja, a student in Stockholm, finds herself on trial for murder after a tragedy at her school. More doubts and suspicions arise when new revelations are made.

name: The Best Years of Our Lives
summary_text: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

name: Beyond the Lights
summary_text: The pressures of fame have superstar singer Noni on the edge, until she meets Kaz, a young cop who works to help her find the courage to develop her own voice and break free to become the artist she was meant to be.

name: Guys and Dolls
summary_text: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

name: iBoy
summary_text: After being shot, Tom wakes from a coma to discover that fragments of his smart phone have been embedded in his head, and worse, that returning to normal teenage life is impossible because he has developed a strange set of superpowers.

name: Wizards
summary_text: The third installment of DreamWork's 'Tales of Arcadia' trilogy. The gang ends up in the past and must make sure that everything happens the way it should.

name: A Walk in the Woods
summary_text: After spending two decades in England, Bill Bryson (Robert Redford) returns to the U.S., where he decides the best way to connect with his homeland is to hike the Appalachian Trail with one of his oldest friends, Stephen Katz (Nick Nolte).

name: Charles in Charge
summary_text: Charles, a college student, is a live-in housekeeper in the Powell household. Charles, along with his friend Buddy, attempts to juggle his studies, friendships, and duties to the family.

name: Remington Steele
summary_text: The cases of a female private detective partnered with a former thief who assumes the role of a fictitious detective in the business.

name: Betty Blue
summary_text: A lackadaisical handyman and aspiring novelist tries to support his younger girlfriend as she slowly succumbs to madness.

name: Drishyam
summary_text: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

name: The Last Summer
summary_text: Standing on the precipice of adulthood, a group of friends navigate new relationships, while reexamining others, during their final summer before college.

name: Benny & Joon
summary_text: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

name: Sympathy for Mr. Vengeance
summary_text: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.

name: Ice
summary_text: A diamond dealer navigates the culturally diverse and otherwise treacherous world of the diamond business.

name: Missing Link
summary_text: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

name: Crimes of Passion
summary_text: A mysterious woman, fashion designer by day and prostitute by night, is hounded by two men: a married father of two children and a sexually repressed preacher.

name: Get a Job
summary_text: After college, Will is having problems getting a good, lasting job, as are his roomies, his girlfriend and his just fired dad.

name: Coriolanus
summary_text: Caius Martius Coriolanus is a war hero, banished from his home, seeking to come back.

name: All That
summary_text: A zany sketch comedy featuring many wacky characters hosted for kids and by kids.

name: Close
summary_text: A female bodyguard is hired to protect an heiress on the run from assassins.

name: The Expecting
summary_text: The dark journey of a young woman down on her luck and pregnant under mysterious circumstances.

name: The Big Sleep
summary_text: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

name: Spun
summary_text: A drug dealer introduces one of his customers, a 'speed freak', to the man who runs the meth lab. A crazy three-day adventure ensues.

name: Breakfast on Pluto
summary_text: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.

name: Auf Wiedersehen, Pet
summary_text: Seven British construction workers escape Britain's ever growing dole queues and travel to Germany to work on a site in Düsseldorf. We follow their trials and tribulations of working away from home and away from the women they left behind.

name: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
summary_text: A bookworm becomes the librarian. Same night a magical spear gets stolen and he's off to get some real life experience around the globe on his quest for the spear - starting with being thrown off a plane over Amazonas by his cute helper.

name: The Unthinkable
summary_text: In Swedish film collective Crazy Pictures feature "Den blomstertid nu kommer" Sweden faces a mysterious attack while Alex tries to reunite with his youth love, Anna.

name: Imitation
summary_text: Based on the webtoon of the same name, it tells the story of the lives of idols in the entertainment industry, centered around the secret romance between a member of a rookie girl group and a member of the top boy group in the industry.

name: Untraceable
summary_text: FBI agent Jennifer Marsh is tasked with hunting down a seemingly untraceable serial killer who posts live videos of his victims on the Internet. As time runs out, the cat and mouse chase becomes more personal.

name: In Good Company
summary_text: A middle-aged ad exec is faced with a new boss who's nearly half his age... and who also happens to be sleeping with his daughter.

name: The Forest
summary_text: A woman goes into Japan's Suicide Forest to find her twin sister, and confronts supernatural terror.

name: The Hitcher
summary_text: A serial killer pins his crimes on two college students who gave him a ride.

name: Mean Machine
summary_text: A football star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.

name: Dragonwyck
summary_text: A simple Connecticut farm girl is recruited by a distant relative, an aristocratic patroon, to be governess to his young daughter in his Hudson Valley mansion.

name: The Wave
summary_text: Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.

name: Inuyasha
summary_text: A teenage girl periodically travels back in time to feudal Japan to help a young half-demon recover the shards of a jewel of great power.

name: Alleyn Mysteries
summary_text: Drawing on her love of theatre and art, New Zealand author Ngaio Marsh created elegant crime-puzzlers full of quirky characters with hidden agendas, all brought meticulously to life in this BBC series.

name: Employee of the Month
summary_text: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.

name: The New WKRP in Cincinnati
summary_text: The further misadventures of the struggling radio station.

name: Her Smell
summary_text: A self-destructive punk rocker struggles with sobriety while trying to recapture the creative inspiration that led her band to success.

name: Jem and the Holograms
summary_text: As a small-town girl catapults from underground video sensation to global superstar, she and her three sisters begin a journey of discovering that some talents are too special to keep hidden.

name: Combat!
summary_text: Combat!, a one-hour World War II drama series, followed a front line American infantry squad as they battled their way across Europe

name: Incident in a Ghostland
summary_text: A mother of two who inherits a house is confronted with murderous intruders on the first night in their new home and fights for her daughters' lives. Sixteen years later when the daughters reunite at the house, things get really strange.

name: Dreamscape
summary_text: A young psychic on the run from himself is recruited by a government agency experimenting with the use of the dream-sharing technology and is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of the U.S. president.

name: Columbus
summary_text: A Korean-born man finds himself stuck in Columbus, Indiana, where his architect father is in a coma. The man meets a young woman who wants to stay in Columbus with her mother, a recovering addict, instead of pursuing her own dreams.

name: Nabillera
summary_text: A 70-year-old with a dream and a 23-year-old with a gift lift each other out of harsh realities and rise to the challenge of becoming ballerinos.

name: Femme Fatale
summary_text: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

name: Wonder Boys
summary_text: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

name: The Hummingbird Project
summary_text: A pair of high-frequency traders go up against their old boss in an effort to make millions in a fiber-optic cable deal.

name: Maps to the Stars
summary_text: A tour into the heart of a Hollywood family chasing celebrity, one another and the relentless ghosts of their pasts.

name: As Sick as They Made Us
summary_text: A divorced mom tries to make peace with her dysfunctional family as she finds a second chance at love.

name: A Very Long Engagement
summary_text: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

name: I Love Dick
summary_text: In an arty Texas town in the desert a woman becomes obsessed with a colleague of her husband's and creates an art project around it, a series of letters that start "Dear Dick..."

name: Why Are You Like This?
summary_text: Best friends Penny and Mia set out to right all that's wrong with the world, blissfully ignorant of how many people they torment along the way.

name: The Forest
summary_text: Sixteen-year-old Jennifer disappears one night from her village in the Ardennes. Captain Gaspard Deker leads the investigation with local cop Virginie Musso, who knew the girl well. They are helped by Eve, a lonely and mysterious woman.

name: Life of Crime
summary_text: Two common criminals get more than they bargained for after kidnapping the wife of a corrupt real-estate developer who shows no interest in paying the $1 million dollar ransom for her safe return.

name: New Nightmare
summary_text: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

name: Shadow of a Doubt
summary_text: A young girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

name: The Duellists
summary_text: France, 1801. Due to a minor, perceived slight mild-mannered Lieutenant d'Hubert is forced into a duel with the hot-headed, irrational Lieutenant Feraud. The disagreement ultimately results in scores of duels, spanning several years.

name: Fruitvale Station
summary_text: The story of Oscar Grant III, a 22-year-old Bay Area resident, who crosses paths with friends, enemies, family, and strangers on the last day of 2008.

name: Play Misty for Me
summary_text: The life of a disc jockey is turned upside down after a romantic encounter with an obsessed fan.

name: The Killing Fields
summary_text: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

name: ARK: The Animated Series
summary_text: In a mysterious primeval land populated by dinosaurs and other extinct creatures, people from throughout human history have been resurrected. When 21st century Australian paleontologist ...                See full summary »

name: Grumpy Old Men
summary_text: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

name: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
summary_text: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

name: Brüno
summary_text: Flamboyant and gay Austrian Brüno looks for new fame in America.

name: Kengan Ashura
summary_text: A timid old man is summoned by his chairman to become the manager of Tokita Ohma, a highly skilled gladiator who only cares about fighting and winning in the Kengan matches.

name: The Cold Light of Day
summary_text: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.

name: Pete's Dragon
summary_text: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.

name: LOL
summary_text: As a new year at school begins, Lola's heart is broken by her boyfriend, though soon she's surprised by her best friend, promising musician Kyle, who reveals his feelings for her.

name: Stagecoach
summary_text: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

name: Bébé's Kids
summary_text: To impress his new girlfriend, a man agrees to look after her friend's kids, only to find that they are uncontrollably rambunctious.

name: Dateline NBC
summary_text: Long-running news-magazine/investigation series.

name: The Glass House
summary_text: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

name: How I Became a Super Hero
summary_text: While superheroes have assimilated into Parisian society, a new drug gives super powers to mere mortals.

name: Trust
summary_text: Rome, 1973. John Paul Getty III, the heir and younger member of an oil tycoons' saga, is kidnapped by the Italian mafia in order to get a ransom.

name: Pie in the Sky
summary_text: DI Crabbe retires from the police force after being shot and sets up his own restaurant. However, his ex-boss, Chief Constable Fisher constantly calls Crabbe back on duty.

name: Max Payne
summary_text: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective and an assassin, who will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

name: Mousehunt
summary_text: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

name: Kate & Leopold
summary_text: An English Duke from 1876 is inadvertedly dragged to modern day New York where he falls for a plucky advertising executive.

name: You Get Me
summary_text: A one night stand turns into a nightmare for a High School student, when the obsession of a young woman grows dangerous.

name: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
summary_text: A girl explores the possibilities in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Ravenous
summary_text: In a remote military outpost in the 19th century, Captain John Boyd and his regiment embark on a rescue mission which takes a dark turn when they are ambushed by a sadistic cannibal.

name: Roman J. Israel, Esq.
summary_text: Roman J. Israel, Esq., a driven, idealistic defense attorney, finds himself in a tumultuous series of events that lead to a crisis and the necessity for extreme action.

name: Yes, God, Yes
summary_text: A good Catholic fifteen-year-old girl finds herself having tempting thoughts after an innocent AOL chat turns unexpectedly racy.

name: The Stuff
summary_text: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.

name: Below
summary_text: Strange happenings occur on a WW II submarine.

name: Manhattan Night
summary_text: A reporter becomes involved with a mysterious woman while investigating her late husband's death.

name: 50 States of Fright
summary_text: Quibi series explores stories based on urban legends from different places in the United States, taking viewers deeper into the horrors that lurk just beneath the surface.

name: Murphy Brown
summary_text: The personal and professional misadventures of an opinionated but beloved woman working as a television journalist.

name: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
summary_text: Agatha Christie's masterful storytelling gets a soupçon of French flair in these attractive, witty mysteries. These French adaptations are a fresh, stylish twist on classic Christie tales.

name: My Dinner with Andre
summary_text: Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.

name: Almost Human
summary_text: In a not-so-distant future, a human cop and an android partner team up to protect and serve.

name: Hope Floats
summary_text: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.

name: The Yin-Yang Master: Dream of Eternity
summary_text: Qing Ming, the Yin-Yang Master, took his master's last wish and went to the Captial Tiandu City to attend the heaven ceremony.

name: The Heartbreak Kid
summary_text: A newlywed man on his honeymoon has second thoughts about his marriage and falls for a different woman.

name: The Good Girl
summary_text: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.

name: Valerie
summary_text: Originally the saga of a working mom raising her three sons alone while her pilot husband is away. After star Valerie Harper left the series, her role was filled by Sandy Duncan as the boys' aunt.

name: After the Wedding
summary_text: A manager of an orphanage in Kolkata travels to New York to meet a benefactor.

name: Lovejoy
summary_text: Lovejoy is an irresistible rogue with a keen eye for antiques. The part-time detective scours the murky salerooms, auction halls and stately homes of Britain, always on the lookout for a find.

name: Communion
summary_text: Oct.4 and Dec.26 the Strieber family drives from NYC to their cabin in the woods. Both nights there are some powerful lights outside and maybe aliens. The dad is mentally affected by the "bad dream", goes to the shrink and is hypnotized.

name: Falcon Crest
summary_text: Set in the vineyards of California, this primetime soap opera featured the conflict within the powerful Gioberti family, owners of the vast Falcon Crest Winery.

name: Broken Trail
summary_text: A veteran cowboy and his nephew save five Chinese girls from prostitution while trekking from Oregon to Wyoming.

name: Sin Senos Sí Hay Paraíso
summary_text: A girl goes on to live difficult times when she chooses to step outside the path her parents had laid out for her.

name: The Enemy Below
summary_text: During World War II, an American destroyer discovers a German U-boat, thus ensuing in a deadly duel between the two ships. The American Captain must draw upon all his experience to defeat the equally experienced German commander.

name: New Jack City
summary_text: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

name: Paris, je t'aime
summary_text: Through the neighborhoods of Paris, love is veiled, revealed, imitated, sucked dry, reinvented and awakened.

name: Lupin III: The First
summary_text: Lupin III goes on a grand adventure to uncover the secrets of the Bresson Diary, which is tied to the legacy of his famous grandfather.

name: Craig of the Creek
summary_text: Craig of the Creek follows a young boy, Craig, and his two friends, Kelsey and JP, as they go on adventures within a world of untamed, kid-dominated wilderness in the creek.

name: The Boss Baby: Back in Business
summary_text: With a little help from his brother and accomplice, Tim, Boss Baby tries to balance family life with his job at Baby Corp headquarters.

name: Sweetheart
summary_text: Jenn has washed ashore a small tropical island and it doesn't take her long to realize she's completely alone. She must spend her days not only surviving the elements, but must also fend off the malevolent force that comes out each night.

name: Spring
summary_text: A young man in a personal tailspin flees from US to Italy, where he sparks up a romance with a woman harboring a dark, primordial secret.

name: Some Girls
summary_text: Michael flies up to French Canada to visit his girlfriend and her wacky family. She doesn't love him anymore, the grandma mistakes him for her late husband, the sister appears naked and makes advances, the dad likes to be naked as well.

name: Careful What You Wish For
summary_text: A guy gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker. Soon, a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal.

name: The Adventures of Robin Hood
summary_text: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.

name: One Eight Seven
summary_text: 15 months after being stabbed 9 times by a student at work as a high school teacher in NYC, Mr. Garfield is working in LA as a substitute teacher come full-time. He refuses to be a victim anymore.

name: The Neighbor
summary_text: Javier is going through a bad patch: he can hardly make it to the end of the month, his business of T-shirts with de-motivational slogans is not quite getting the attention, and his ...                See full summary »

name: Dragons: Race to the Edge
summary_text: Unlock the secrets of the Dragon Eye and come face to face with more dragons than anyone has ever imagined as Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders soar to the edge of adventure.

name: She's Out of Control
summary_text: When an average-looking teenage girl gets a makeover, it's enough to make her father become overprotective of her.

name: Made in Heaven
summary_text: It is the story of two wedding planners in Delhi, where tradition jostles with modern aspirations against the backdrop of big fat Indian weddings revealing many secrets and lies.

name: The Bureau of Magical Things
summary_text: Teenage girl Kyra accidentally discovers an extraordinary world and gains magical powers; when an unexpected threat emerges, she must unite fairies, elves and humans to save them all.

name: Always
summary_text: The spirit of a recently deceased expert pilot mentors a newer pilot while watching him fall in love with the girlfriend that he left behind.

name: Start-Up
summary_text: Two boys in stormy period are becoming real adults as they experience a world that doesn't go their way.

name: The Innocents
summary_text: Looking like a young, handsome and charismatic businessman from the outside, Han is filled with his family's painful memories and tragedy inside. After returning from the U.S., he devotes ...                See full summary »

name: The Cleveland Show
summary_text: The adventures of the Family Guy (1999) neighbor and former deli owner, Cleveland Brown.

name: Ladies in Black
summary_text: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies in Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

name: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
summary_text: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

name: Like Mike
summary_text: A 13-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "M.J." inside.

name: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
summary_text: After being mistaken for terrorists and thrown into Guantánamo Bay, stoners Harold and Kumar escape and return to the U.S., where they proceed to flee across the country with federal agents in hot pursuit.

name: Mayor of Kingstown
summary_text: The McLusky family - power brokers in Kingstown, Michigan where the business of incarceration is the only thriving industry. Tackling themes of systemic racism, corruption and inequality.

name: Deep Water
summary_text: When a young gay man is brutally murdered near Bondi Beach, Detectives Tori Lustigman and Nick Manning are assigned to investigate. After more bodies are found, Tori links the deaths to a series of murders of gay men in the 1980s and '90s.

name: A.N.T. Farm
summary_text: A musical prodigy gets into a gifted program called Advanced Natural Talents at the local high school.

name: Honour
summary_text: DCI Caroline Goode vows to bring justice for a young girl, murdered by her family for falling in love with the wrong man.

name: Double Impact
summary_text: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 3
summary_text: Plot details kept under wraps.

name: Dry Wind
summary_text: The area around Catalan in Brazil's state of Goiás is dry, very dry. Sandro's life here is somewhat monotonous. He works in a fertilizer factory and divides his days between the city club, ...                See full summary »

name: Hopscotch
summary_text: Grounded with a desk job by incompetent superiors, a clever CIA agent retires and writes a tell all memoir that will embarrass his bosses, prompting him to go on the run and elude them.

name: Conviction
summary_text: A working mother puts herself through law school in an effort to represent her brother, who has been wrongfully convicted of murder and has exhausted his chances to appeal his conviction through public defenders.

name: Mannequin: On the Move
summary_text: A young department store intern falls in love with a female store mannequin who is really a peasant girl fallen under a thousand year spell. She comes to life whenever he removes the cursed necklace from her.

name: The Machine
summary_text: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

name: Absolutely Anything
summary_text: A group of eccentric aliens confers a human being with the power to do absolutely anything, as an experiment.

name: Degrassi High
summary_text: The lives and trials of students of a city high school.

name: Sea Fever
summary_text: The crew of a West of Ireland trawler, marooned at sea, struggle for their lives against a growing parasite in their water supply.

name: The Wizard of Lies
summary_text: The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history.

name: Mississippi Grind
summary_text: Down on his luck and facing financial hardship, Gerry teams up with younger charismatic poker player, Curtis, in an attempt to change his luck. The two set off on a road trip through the South with visions of winning back what's been lost.

name: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
summary_text: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
summary_text: Two alchemist brothers go on a quest for the Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their dead mother goes horribly wrong.

name: Marnie
summary_text: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

name: Halston
summary_text: Prodigiously talented, Halston reigned over fashion in the 1970s and became a household name. But everything changed in the Wall Street era. With his empire under threat, Halston took the biggest gamble of his life.

name: Light as a Feather
summary_text: A group of teenage girls must deal with supernatural fallout stemming from an innocent game of "Light as a Feather, Stiff as a Board" when they start dying off in the exact way predicted.

name: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
summary_text: A raunchy spoof edition of Countdown (1982) with the stars of 8 Out of 10 Cats (2005).

name: An Officer and a Spy
summary_text: In 1894, French Captain Alfred Dreyfus is wrongfully convicted of treason and sentenced to life imprisonment at Devil's island.

name: Hot Pursuit
summary_text: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the outgoing widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

name: Blue Story
summary_text: Feature adaptation of Rapman's YouTube series about two young friends who become rivals in a street war.

name: Toy Soldiers
summary_text: A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school.

name: Wisting
summary_text: Homicide detective William Wisting struggles with the two toughest cases of his career. His serial killer investigation crosses paths with his journalist daughter's news story, putting her in grave danger.

name: Triple Threat
summary_text: When a billionaire's daughter intent on bringing down a major crime syndicate is targeted by a group of professional assassins, a team of mercenaries must stop them before they kill her.

name: Tooth Fairy
summary_text: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

name: That Damn Michael Che
summary_text: A theme or incident, such as police brutality, unemployment and romance and use sketches and vignettes to illustrate what it feels like to experience this from a Black vantage point.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
summary_text: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

name: Kalifornia
summary_text: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

name: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
summary_text: Alexander's day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

name: The Swordsman
summary_text: Three different swordsmen -- a swordsman who is going blind, the best swordsman in Joseon Dynasty, and the best swordsman in Qing Dynasty who aspires to be the best even in the Joseon Dynasty -- meet each other for their own reasons.

name: Reign Over Me
summary_text: A man who lost his family in the September 11 attack on New York City runs into his old college roommate. Rekindling the friendship is the one thing that appears able to help the man recover from his grief.

name: Shutter
summary_text: A young photographer and his girlfriend discover mysterious shadows in their photographs after a tragic accident. They soon learn that you can not escape your past.

name: Midnight, Texas
summary_text: Midnight is a safe haven for those who are different, but with the presence of outsiders, the residents band together and form a strong and unlikely family.

name: Friends with Kids
summary_text: Two best friends decide to have a child together while keeping their relationship platonic, so they can avoid the toll kids can take on romantic relationships.

name: The Football Factory
summary_text: An insight on the gritty life of a bored male, Chelsea football hooligan who lives for violence, sex, drugs & alcohol.

name: Ricki and the Flash
summary_text: A musician who gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom returns home, looking to make things right with her family.

name: Beerfest
summary_text: Two brothers travel to Germany for Oktoberfest, only to stumble upon a secret, centuries-old competition described as a "Fight Club" with beer games.

name: The Birth of a Nation
summary_text: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

name: Dracula
summary_text: After a naive real estate agent succumbs to the will of Count Dracula, the two head to London where the vampire sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
summary_text: The world-famous singing preteen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.
